Package science.aist.machinelearning.algorithm.ils

Class IterativeLocalSearchAlgorithm<GT,​PT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • science.aist.machinelearning.core.AbstractAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
      • science.aist.machinelearning.algorithm.ils.IterativeLocalSearchAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm<GT,​PT>, Configurable
    public class IterativeLocalSearchAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
    Implementation for a local search.

    Creates a single mapping and creates a mutated copy from it. Will keep the better mapping and start mutating again.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Wilfing

        Calculate the bestQuality of the two solutions. Returns the mapping with the better quality.
        Parameters:
        solution - mapping to compare
        bestSolution - previous best mapping to compare
        Returns:
